name: Water States
description:
Water States

A downloadable game for Windows and macOS


A small platform game about change, made for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2020

You are an ice cube that has the ability to change your physical state whenever you want, but in a limited amount, so use it wisely!

As ice you can damage enemies but you can also be hurt by them!
As steam you can go up to infinity but when you touch a cold surface it will condense and drip
As a liquid you can avoid damage to traps and enemies, but in cold weather it will soon freeze so be smart!

Traps can sometimes change your physical state too, take advantage of it!

--------------------------------------------

Controls:

Walk
Keyboard: Left and Right arrows
Controller: D-pad or Left Stick

Become Steam:
Keyboard: X
Controller: Xbox Y - Duashock Triangle

Become Water:
Keyboard: C
Controller: Xbox B - Duashock Circle

Become Ice:
Keyboard: Z
Controller: Xbox X - Duashock Square

Become Fire: 
Keyboard: B??? + D??
Controller: S?? + D??

Start/Pause:
Keyboard: P/Enter
Controller: Xbox Start - Duashock Options

Jump: 
Keyboard: Space / Up Arrow
Controller: Xbox A - Duashock Cross
